summary_text:
Profile
Friendly and engaging team player and leader able to inspire staff to perform their best. Detail oriented
and experienced restaurant manager passionate about food and beverages. A multi-tasker who excels at
staff training and recruiting with a track record of inspiring great customer service and customer
satisfaction. Regularly exceed sales goals. A master in the art of upselling.
